Name: The Golden Tiki
Description: Hand Crafted Tiki Drinks made with Fresh Squeezed Juices, Home Made Syrups, and Top Shelf Booze. These aren't your Cruise Ship pre mixed cocktails. These specialty drinks take time …Learn more about The Golden Tiki, Opens a popupSpecialtiesHand Crafted Tiki Drinks made with Fresh Squeezed Juices, Home Made Syrups, and Top Shelf Booze. These aren't your Cruise Ship pre mixed cocktails. These specialty drinks take time and are for true cocktail enthusiasts.HistoryEstablished in 2015.Branden Powers , The Golden Tiki'smanaging partner has a long history in Tiki Culture. Over 20 years to be exact. He originally started promoting the Islands Lounge and Restaurant in the old Hanalei Hotel , San Diego. His night , Taboo was one of the first weekly nights to embrace the emerging love of all things tiki. Branden would Dj under the name Chi Chi Martini. His vinyl record collection is over 15,000 records. One of the most extensive Exotica collections in the world. Now the Crown Point Hotel and Mecca for Tiki lovers around the globe who gather yearly for Tiki Oasis. Branden has been a resident of Las Vegas since 2000, and is the former Creative Director of the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino. He was also named "Las Vegas' Most Interesting Man" , we just think thats a nice way of calling him a weirdo. Like most weirdos, Branden is a creative genius. A true artist. He has created what can only be described as one of the most unique tiki bars ever seenMeet the Business Owner
